alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 1:27AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hamilton and southwestern Merrick Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 127 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Phillips, or 9 miles southeast of Grand Island, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Phillips around 130 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Aurora, Marquette and Hordville. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 318 and 330. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
